column1: Uchi////As it was sake social time
column2: my boyfriend and I got some drinks: takara nigori and kara kyuri.  Homeboi had like 3 kara kyuri's that night... he can not only drink
column3: but we can attest that it did taste really good: light and refreshing.  We also ordered the negi hama futomaki
column4: which was a small sushi roll and one that I particularly enjoyed.  Had a nice flavour and crunch.  We also ordered some of the brussel sprouts
column5: which we had last time and were pleasantly surprised by.  Has a nice
column6: umami flavour with a bit of char.  When you think of brussel sprouts they sound really... unappetizing
column7: for a lack of better words
column8: but this dish is really good.
